wikipedia_page.main: William John Mannion (born 5 May 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Cambridge United.

response: *  Will Mannion
* On 1 July 2016, goalkeeper Will Mannion was signed from AFC Wimbledon on a three-year contract.

*On 28 November 2017, Will Mannion went on an emergency week-long loan to Plymouth Argyle.
| 28 November 2017 || GK ||  || Will Mannion || Plymouth Argyle || 4 December 2017 ||
* On 9 August 2018, goalkeeper Will Mannion went on loan at Aldershot Town until 20 January 2019, but this was later extended until the end of the season.
* On 1 March 2019, Markus Henriksen and Will Mannion had their contracts with the club extended by 1 year.
| 9 August 2018 || GK ||  || Will Mannion || Aldershot Town || 31 May 2019 ||
#REDIRECT Will Mannion
* On 29 November 2019, Will Mannion moved on loan to Kidderminster Harriers until  January 2020, but this was later extended for the remainder of the season.

* On 16 June 2020, following Kidderminster Harriers season termination on 22 April 2020 after a vote of clubs in the league, Will Mannion returned to the club and agreed a short-term contract extension to cover the extended season.
| 29 November 2019 || GK ||  || Will Mannion ||  Kidderminster Harriers || 30 June 2020 ||

Pears made his England U19s debut on 1 September in a 1-1 draw against the Netherlands, coming on as a substitute for Will Mannion in the 46th minute. His final appearance for the U19s national team came on 10 October in England's 2-1 win against Bulgaria.
* On 23 July 2020, the club announced the release of Will Mannion, Robbie McKenzie, Kevin Stewart and Jon Toral.
| 23 July 2020 || GK ||  || Will Mannion ||  Pafos || Released ||
On 13 August, Will Mannion joined Pafos after being released by Hull City.
